page.title: 08AMERICAN SCHOOLS (cont).
page.content: (5 year olds attend Kindergarten).The subjects taught at this school are basically the same as most British primary schools.However,Spanish is taught to the older pupils.The average size of a class is 15.The primary school does not have its own physical education facilities so pupils are transported to a nearby public field. Here they participate in several sports including gymnastics,athletics, soccer,softball and baseball. At the age of 11 the pupils will leave the elementary school and move to the junior high school at the other site. {SECONDARY SCHOOL The first 2 years of secondary school are known as junior high.This is where individual subjects are taught by separate teachers.At 14 years of age the pupils move to high
